title: Launsh Configuration
description: Configuration file for launsh, a GUI script launcher.

executions.description: A map of all defined executions, where the key is the execution name.

description.description: A description of what the execution does.

args.description: A list of arguments for the execution.

working_dir.description: The working directory from which to run the execution.

stdout.description: The path to a file to which standard output is redirected.

stderr.description: The path to a file to which standard error is redirected.

environment.description: A map of environment variables for the execution.

variable.description: A list of variables for the execution.
